method.name: flickr.tags.getListUserPopular
method.description: Get the popular tags for a given user (or the currently logged in user).
method.response: <who id="12037949754@N01"> <tags> <tag count="10">bar</tag> <tag count="11">foo</tag> <tag count="147">gull</tag> <tag count="3">tags</tag> <tag count="3">test</tag> </tags> </who>

arguments.argument: Your API application key. See here for more details.
The NSID of the user to fetch the tag list for. If this argument is not specified, the currently logged in user (if any) is assumed.
Number of popular tags to return. defaults to 10 when this argument is not present.

errors.error: The date argument passed was incorrect.
The API key passed was not valid or has expired.
The requested service is temporarily unavailable.
The requested response format was not found.
The requested method was not found.
The SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
The XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
One or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
